summary: Iteration 92: Mosaic Community Landing Page fully tested. Backend: 10/10 tests passed - GET /api/ticker/landing-images returns all 4 mosaic image keys (mosaic_pingpong_chess, mosaic_kids_learning, mosaic_culture, mosaic_gathering), GET /api/public/ui-style confirms layout='mosaic_community' is active, GET /api/community-v2/landing returns expected data structure. Frontend: All UI elements render correctly - header with 'ChiPi Link', cultural nav with 6 icons (PinPan, Tienda, Ranking, Aprender, Cultura, Fe), mosaic grid with 4 image tiles and 4 info cards, CTA banner 'Join the Mosaic', footer, login button, bottom navigation. All navigation routes work correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/health returns 200 with status 'healthy'
Backend: GET /api/ticker/landing-images returns 200 with all 4 mosaic keys
Backend: All mosaic image URLs are from Emergent CDN (static.prod-images.emergentagent.com)
Backend: GET /api/public/ui-style returns layout='mosaic_community' as active
Backend: Public UI style has all required fields (template, layout, primary_color, font_family, etc.)
Backend: GET /api/community-v2/landing returns expected structure (destacados, noticias, eventos, galerias)
Backend: GET /api/public/module-status returns 200
Backend: mosaic_community is registered in AVAILABLE_LAYOUTS (confirmed by active layout)
Backend: Landing images API returns proper structure for admin customization
Backend: All 4 mosaic images have unique URLs
Frontend: Mosaic landing component [data-testid='mosaic-landing'] renders
Frontend: Header renders with 'ChiPi Link' text [data-testid='mosaic-header']
Frontend: Login button visible when not authenticated [data-testid='mosaic-login-btn']
Frontend: Cultural nav bar renders [data-testid='cultural-nav']
Frontend: All 6 cultural nav icons present (pinpan, tienda, ranking, aprender, cultura, fe)
Frontend: Mosaic grid section renders [data-testid='mosaic-grid']
Frontend: All 4 image tiles render (pingpong-chess, kids, culture, gathering)
Frontend: All 4 info cards render (store, rapid, events, players)
Frontend: CTA banner with 'Join the Mosaic' text [data-testid='mosaic-cta']
Frontend: Footer with 'ChiPi Link' text [data-testid='mosaic-footer']
Frontend: Bottom navigation visible on mobile [data-testid='bottom-nav']
Frontend: Bottom nav has Home, Explore, Store, Cart, Login items
Frontend: Mobile viewport renders responsive mosaic grid
Frontend: PinPan nav navigates to /pinpanclub
Frontend: Tienda nav navigates to /unatienda
Frontend: Ranking nav navigates to /pinpanclub/superpin/ranking
Frontend: Store card navigates to /unatienda
Frontend: Events card navigates to /eventos
Frontend: Login button navigates to /login
critical_code_review_comments: MosaicCommunityLanding.jsx is well-structured with proper component separation (CulturalNav, MosaicTile, InfoCard)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
useLandingImages hook correctly merges default images with backend-customized ones
Layout correctly registered in LAYOUT_COMPONENTS map in SuperAppLanding.jsx
Backend correctly returns mosaic image keys with fallback defaults

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all UI elements verified, all navigation working)

test_credentials.admin: LaoPan OAuth required - no test credentials (uses laopan.online SSO)

seed_data_creation: None required - using existing landing images configuration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 92 tested Mosaic Community Landing Page (4th layout for ChiPi Wallet). Component at /app/frontend/src/pages/landing-layouts/MosaicCommunityLanding.jsx. Key data-testids: mosaic-landing, mosaic-header, mosaic-login-btn, cultural-nav, cultural-nav-{pinpan|tienda|ranking|aprender|cultura|fe}, mosaic-grid, mosaic-tile-{pingpong-chess|kids|culture|gathering}, mosaic-card-{store|rapid|events|players}, mosaic-cta, mosaic-footer. Backend APIs: GET /api/ticker/landing-images returns mosaic_* image keys, GET /api/public/ui-style confirms mosaic_community layout is active. Layout selection stored in MongoDB ui_style config. No hero section - uses mosaic grid approach with cultural icon navigation.
